projects.title: PharmGPT
projects.description: Your Advanced AI Pharmacology Assistant - An intelligent chatbot providing comprehensive drug information, mechanism of action analysis, and clinical guidance. Features conversation management, document processing, and both fast and detailed response modes for pharmaceutical queries.
projects.technicalApproach: Built using advanced language models with specialized pharmaceutical knowledge base, implementing retrieval-augmented generation for accurate drug information, mechanism analysis, and clinical recommendations with real-time query processing.
projects.architecture: Streamlit-based web application with conversation state management, document upload capabilities, and multi-modal response system supporting both quick answers and detailed pharmaceutical analysis with persistent chat history.
projects.deployment: Deployed on Streamlit Cloud with optimized performance for real-time pharmaceutical queries and document processing capabilities, ensuring fast response times and reliable uptime.
